## FormAPI type

### FormAPI type

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
export declare type FormAPI<T> = Omit<UseFormReturn<T>, 'trigger' | 'handleSubmit'> & {
    errors: FieldErrors<T>;
};
```
<b>Import</b>

```typescript
import { FormAPI } from '@grafana/ui';
```
